attr.title: Metal Slug FB Fanthology
attr.desc: Metal Slug SB Fanthology is a fan game developed by SuperBlinky, which has been in development since 2020. The latest version of the project is 0.7.2 The main goal of the project is to create 8 new Metal Slug experiences based on the 8 mainline games.
attr.inst: Download the game from  [GameJolt](https://gamejolt.com/games/MslugSBFan/478697) and put all the files from the `Files` folder (the one with all the audiogroups) into the `ports/mslugsbf/assets` folder.
